config_options.label: Fetch external images and load them into the user default upload folder (default is on)

config_options.label: Allow SVG images from external sources (SECURITY WARNING
config_options.description: SVG files can contain JavaScript and pose XSS risks. Only enable if you trust the image sources and have additional sanitization in place. Default is off for security)
